response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly benefit you. We understand its worth to both parties stands at $800,000 to you, and we aim to create a mutually beneficial transaction. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional product for $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while allowing us to maintain the value of our offering. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
